title: The 10 most important interpretations of riding a plane in a dream by senior scholars

preview.html: Riding a plane in a dream: When we want to travel, we immediately plan to travel by plane because it is the most convenient, but we find that boarding a plane in a dream is different from landing on it, and driving it calmly is different from driving it with fear and tension. There is no doubt that traveling by plane is a great convenience, as arriving anywhere in record time is the fastest means of transportation, and the vision may indicate achieving goals in a short period of time. Also? Or does it have other meanings? We will know this in the article. Flying a plane in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he is the one flying the plane, then this expresses his control over the affairs of his entire life without any interference, so he lives a comfortable life without worries and problems. The vision indicates ascending to a high position that puts the dreamer in the right place that he dreams about. He will enjoy it throughout his life and hopes to reach it as quickly as possible. The vision also shows interest in religion and God Almighty’s satisfaction with good deeds and abandoning mistakes and sins. If the dreamer suffers from some problems during this period, then this dream indicates comfort and financial stability that will make the dreamer achieve everything he wants. He aspires to it. The vision expresses the speed of achieving desires and goals and changing circumstances from a bad situation to a better and more beautiful situation, as moving to a better home and a suitable job brings him to a wonderful level that he did not expect. Flying an airplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the flight has a promising sign. . There is no doubt that movement in the time of our venerable scholar Ibn Sirin was available through animals for travel, the most important of which were camels. Therefore, it is found that the dream indicates the rise to the best and the fulfillment of the desires that the dreamer desires throughout his life, as the vision indicates that the dreamer will be saved from some harmful things that make him suffer from harm and exhaustion. The dream indicates tremendous success. If the dreamer is studying, this indicates his high position in the world. Knowledge and his progress to reach the highest school certificates that inevitably make him reach his ambitions and desires. The fear of boarding a plane leads to some difficulties that cause severe suffering to the dreamer, so he should be patient with everything he goes through and pray to his Lord that the ordeals and hardships will end soon. Driving a plane in A dream by Al-Osaimi: If the plane crashes, this means that goals and desires are not achieved, as it leads to many problems that make the dreamer unable to reach what he wants at the right time, and here the dreamer feels that he is standing still and not moving forward. So he has to be patient and all of this will end. Driving a small plane almost indicates happiness and progress towards the better, as life at the appropriate and wonderful material level and tremendous prosperity in the future makes the dreamer spend a pleasant time with this feeling. Al-Osaimi believes that the dream indicates the achievement of everything he desires The dreamer and everything he thinks about during his life. He lives in a cramped house, he will move to a bigger and bigger house in the near future. If the dreamer sees that he is afraid to take a plane, this means that he is under psychological pressure that will make him feel anxious for a while, but he will not continue to do so, but all this damage will go away. In the remembrance of God Almighty

title: Interpretation of a dream about expelling guests in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about expelling guests in a dream is one of the dreams that many people see and are searching for the meaning of expelling guests from dreams. Interpretation of a dream about expelling guests in a dream: Seeing yourself moving away from guests in a dream is a sign of defecation and mood changes for the better. Whoever sees that he expels someone else From his house, this is a sign of abundant kindness and livelihood. Seeing someone being expelled from the house in a dream is a sign of the end of worries and sorrows. If one sees in a dream that he is leading his guests away, this is a sign that he is surrounded by haters. Expelling guests from the house is a sign that you You feel very tired and you are getting rid of this feeling. Seeing someone leading someone out of his house is a sign of his freedom from fear and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about visitors to my houseSeeing visitors in the house is a sign of the return of strangers and travelers. If one sees a friend in the house, this is a sign of blessing Kindness and coming. Seeing guests at home greeting them with a smile is a sign that good things are coming your way. If the dreamer is sick and dreams of receiving guests at home, this is an indication that recovery from illness is imminent. When guests see a girl’s plate in a dream, this is a sign of Nutrition and its close relationship. If a person sees in a dream that he is receiving visitors, this is a sign of his academic success. To see him receiving guests, sitting with them, and giving them gifts, is an indication of the approaching marriage. If a person sees that there are visitors coming to him without an appointment, this is a sign of money The project that he earns. Interpretation of a dream about visitors from relativesIf a married woman sees that in a dream she is receiving guests from her relatives, this indicates the stability of marital life. Seeing relatives receiving visitors in a dream is an indication of happy events that will occur in the family. If the fiancée sees that she is receiving guests in Her house, this indicates her recent marriage. Seeing receiving family and relatives in a dream is a sign of hearing good news. Seeing relatives and friends in the house is an indication of the great goodness that the dreamer will receive. Seeing relatives in a dream while they are in our house is a sign of the husband’s love for her. Seeing unknown relatives in a dream when he was at home to hear bad news. If someone sees that there are relatives gathered in the house and crying, this is a sign that the gulf is close to insight. Interpretation of a dream about visiting someone’s houseWhen you see someone visiting the house in a dream, this is a sign of Friendship and love between them. If one sees that someone is visiting him to provide him a service, this is a sign of the many services he is already providing. If he sees that his partner is visiting him in his home, this indicates that he is going through some problems and crises. Seeing someone sitting with someone during Visiting him is a sign of strong ties that unite them. Interpretation of a dream for foreigners If a girl sees strangers in a dream, this is a sign that the latter will enter the house. If bad women see guests inside their home, this is a sign of the problems and fears they face. – If a commoner sees

title: Seeing chicken in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing chicken in a dream for a single woman Chicken in a dream for a single woman has more than one meaning and more than one interpretation, and therefore we present the following interpretation of seeing a chicken in a dream for a single girl, including: Seeing chicken in a dream for a single woman is evidence that the dreamer is dreaming of wishes and big dreams that she has always wanted In achieving it for a long time and, God willing, you will achieve it. When an unmarried girl sees live chickens in her dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will face many crises and problems in the coming period. But he will be able to overcome this crisis and this period with the help of friends. When an unmarried girl sees Chicken in her dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer will get married soon and succeed in her married life. This dream, in general, is considered good news for her. A single girl seeing in her dream that she is eating raw chicken, this vision is considered an unpleasant vision. This is because it indicates that the dreamer He is exposed to the absence of the unrighteous. Raw chicken in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of the dreamer’s challenge to her reputation by evil people. This in turn will lead to the deity postponing marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing a chicken leg in a dreamInterpretation of seeing chicken in a dream for a pregnant womanSeeing a chicken in a dream For a pregnant woman, its interpretation varies depending on the condition of the chicken and its appearance in the dream, and the interpretation is as follows: For a pregnant woman to see in her dream a beautiful, clean chicken is a sign that the dreamer will have a very beautiful female with a distinctive shape. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream a small chicken. This dream is considered a sign However, the woman, God willing, will give birth easily and conveniently, and her health will be good if she wishes, as well as the fetus. Raw chicken when a pregnant woman looks at it in a dream is interpreted as a sign that the dreamer will face a difficult period during the next pregnancy period. She will face many health problems. When A pregnant woman dreams of grilled chicken, then the dream is a sign that the dreamer will give birth to a son, God willing. When a pregnant woman sees a cooked chicken in a dream, the dream is interpreted as a sign of goodness and happiness that this woman will enjoy in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a chicken in a dream for a married woman: Seeing chicken in a dream for a married woman is sometimes a good omen and sometimes the opposite. Here are the most important interpretations: Seeing chicken in a dream for a married woman is considered a good sign for her, her family, and everyone concerned. If a married woman sees chickens in her dream, she will become pregnant soon, God willing. The dream also indicates that the dreamer will have good offspring in the long term. Married woman You see chickens in a dream that have fully grown, and the dream in this case is an indication that the dreamer will be able to live a stable and quiet life with her husband. Seeing chickens in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the husband’s love for his wife. The dream also reflects the husband’s great respect for the effort his wife puts in daily. When a married woman dreams that she is eating a chicken leg, this dream is a sign of a certain illness that will take time

title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin is seeing rice in a dream

preview.html: Rice in a dream Rice is one of the types of food that never leaves a table, and there are many types, and when he sees it in a dream, the dreamer wonders about its interpretation and it will bring him good and expect bad or bad. And take refuge from him? We will answer all these questions through this article by presenting the largest number of issues and interpretations of leading scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Rice in a dream Seeing rice in a dream carries many connotations and signs that can be identified through the following cases: Rice in a dream indicates Goodness and blessing in the diet and improvement of the dreamer’s conditions after suffering and exhaustion. If the dreamer sees rice in his dream, this symbolizes his serious efforts to achieve goals and achieve great success in his work and life. Seeing rice in a dream means good news and it makes things easier for the dreamer in his life. Rice in Dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin discussed the interpretation of rice in a dream due to its frequent occurrence, and the following are some of the interpretations contained in it: Rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates recovery from illness and enjoyment of the dreamer’s health and well-being. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is preparing rice, this symbolizes the good luck that He will enjoy it in his life and receive good opportunities that will improve his life. Seeing rice in a dream indicates the end of disputes and conflicts that occurred between the dreamer and someone close to him and the return of relationships better than before. Rice in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of rice in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s social status, The following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who sees rice in a dream indicates that she has heard good news and the arrival of joys and happy occasions. If an unmarried woman sees grains of rice in a dream, this symbolizes the positive changes that will occur in her life and will make her Happier. Seeing a girl cooking rice in a dream means that she will marry a generous person with whom she will live a happy and prosperous life. Rice in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees rice in her dream is a sign of many good things and abundance of sustenance that she will gain in her life. If she sees A married woman sees rice in a dream, as this symbolizes the stability of her married life and the strong and happy relationship she has with her life partner. Rice in a dream for a married woman indicates the marriage of one of her daughters who have reached marriageable age. Rice in a dream for a pregnant woman During pregnancy, a woman sees many dreams that contain On symbols that are difficult for her to understand, so we will help her interpret her vision of rice in a dream, as follows: A pregnant woman who sees rice in her dream means that she will be able to give birth and that she and her newborn will be fine. If a pregnant woman sees rice in black in a dream, this symbolizes To a health crisis that she will suffer from that may affect the safety of the fetus, and she must seek refuge from this vision and pray to God to protect her. Rice in a pregnant woman’s dream relieves distress and brings relief.

title: Interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Brothers and sisters, we move, God willing, to presenting the interpretation of the rainbow in a dream, within the chapter on the interpretation of the sky and rain, as well as according to the interpretation of dreams given by the letter Q. Single, married and pregnant women. I wish you the best in the matter.Rainbow in a dream and dream interpretationIn most books specializing in the interpretation of dreams, it has been entered that the rainbow is one of the best visions, especially if it is clearly visible and its colors sparkle in clear weather or beautiful weather. Seeing a rainbow means that you expect good news, both professionally and socially. A large rainbow shows travel to distant lands. In general, a rainbow remains a good omen for everyone who has seen it in a dream. A green rainbow in a dream indicates security and is a sign of stability and kindness. A red rainbow in a dream indicates hostility, discord, strife and conflict. Yellow in a dream indicates fatigue and illness. The rainbow in a dream is interpreted by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams: The green rainbow is evidence of safety from drought, poverty, and the injustice of time or authority. Yellow is a sign of illness or fatigue, and red can indicate a conflict. The great commentator adds that the rainbow is a sign of exit, journey, or departure. Seeing it on the right is a sign of kindness, and seeing it on the left could indicate the opposite. Interpretation of a rainbow for a girl or a single woman: A rainbow in one dream is good, as it is a sign of ambition and success, and perhaps seeing it in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires. The green rainbow is an indicator of confidence and peace of mind. Interpretation of the rainbow in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe rainbow carries many positive connotations in a pregnant woman’s dream, as it expresses calm, serenity, and peace of mind, and in the interpretation it is security. Interpretation of the rainbow in a dream for a married womanRainbow in a dream A married woman expresses psychological comfort, the disappearance of tension and sadness, and it is an indicator of livelihood and evidence of well-being, for women in general and for married women in particular. What does it mean to see a rainbow at night? Night in a dream is peace and comfort, and seeing a rainbow in a dream at night can To express a psychological state full of faith, safety and security, because its seven colors can express joy, pleasure and the arrival of goodness after a long time. Wait, this is an indication of happiness for every man or woman. Brothers and sisters, this is the complete interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream. I hope you liked the article. We will meet, God willing, with a new interpretation as long as you are under God’s care and protection.

title: Interpretation of seeing a white cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing white cats in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a white cat attacking in a dream? What did Ibn Sirin say about seeing a white cat in a dream for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman? Are all dreams of white cats interpreted as omens or not? Learn about the secrets of this dream through the article paragraphs below. You have a dream that confuses you. What are you waiting for... Google Dream Interpretation website on the Internet. White cat in a dream. A dream about a calm white cat is interpreted as a safe and stable life and the coming years will be full of kindness, prosperity, and a lot of money. Seeing a white cat in If the dream looks strange and scary, then it is. It was interpreted as hypocrisy and patience of enemies towards the dreamer as follows: Seeing white cats with long teeth: It indicates treacherous and powerful enemies, and the dreamer must not fight with them before he is sure that he is as strong as them, lest he suffer a harsh, crushing defeat. Seeing wild white cats: May The vision, if interpreted by an evil woman, indicates years full of unhappiness that the dreamer will experience. Seeing a white cat with a long black tail: It refers to the devious and hypocritical person who follows the monarch and interferes in his affairs to easily harm him. Seeing large white cats attacking the fortuneteller: Interpreted by women who are harmful and intensely envious of the dreamer in reality. Seeing a white cat with red eyes and a frightening look: indicates a girl from the dreamer’s relatives who hates and detests her, and can harm her in the shortest time, and since God made the dreamer dream of this vision, he must beware of her social relationships. With relatives or strangers, and is strengthened with them. The Holy Qur’an and praying a lot. Seeing a half-white, half-blonde cat: It indicates sad times and difficult days that the dreamer swears by and will live soon. A white cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A white cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates blessings and luck, provided that it does not bite the dreamer or harm him. If The dreamer saw an annoying white cat and failed to control it in a dream, then this indicates many problems and an unstable life that he will live in reality. When the dreamer sees a large white cat standing in front of the door of his house as if he is guarding the house from any harm in the dream, the scene is promising and is interpreted that The dreamer is immune from all evil, and God can use power. People to save him from the machinations of haters. And if the dreamer runs away from a white cat in a dream, he will escape from the evil of a false and deceitful woman in reality. The white cat in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi said that the white cat is an auspicious symbol and if the dreamer sees a white cat smiling at him and feels comfortable after looking at it In a dream, these are good things, and in reality many good tidings come to him. But the death of the white cat and the dreamer’s sadness over it in the dream is evidence of joy that will not be complete and the anguish that will soon permeate the dreamer’s life. The presence of a white cat sitting in the dreamer’s house and not harming it in the dream is evidence of Stabilizing his life circumstances and gaining cover and blessings in reality. A white cat in a dream for a single woman

Seeing a white cat with red eyes and a frightening look: indicates a girl from the dreamer’s relatives who hates and detests her, and can harm her in the shortest time, and since God made the dreamer dream of this vision, he must beware of her social relationships. With relatives or strangers, and is strengthened with them. The Holy Qur’an and praying a lot. Seeing a half-white, half-blonde cat: It indicates sad times and difficult days that the dreamer swears by and will live soon. A white cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A white cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates blessings and luck, provided that it does not bite the dreamer or harm him. title: Interpretation of seeing a needle prick in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a needle prick in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a man, woman and single girl As seeing a needle prick in a dream is one of the confusing visions that its owners are looking for an explanation in a scientific way, so we will try to shed light on some of the interpretations of the most important dream interpretation scholars with the need to emphasize that what we will provide is nothing more than general information about the interpretation of this vision, but to conclude this vision for any other vision there is a similarity between them, because this is one of the wrong things, because the interpretation of the vision must agree. Interpreter until the details of the vision are complete and answer some details that the dream interpreter must know before interpreting the dream. See also: Toilet in a dream Interpretation of seeing a needle prick in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a needle prick in a dream Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing a needle prick in a dream can be a sign for an unmarried young man or girl who will get married soon - God willing. But if this vision is for a poor man, this may be a humanitarian gesture for him - God willing - in exchange for the large sum he will receive. As for if the dream is about a needle with a thread on it, this - God willing - is one of the indications that the dreamer will have good conditions and will be freed from many crises and problems that he has suffered from. Also, if the needle breaks in a dream, this indicates the maze that the dreamer is suffering from. See also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing a medical needle in a dream Seeing a medical needle in a dream is one of the signs that indicate a speedy recovery - God willing - from worries, diseases and pains. As for dreaming of a hole with a needle, this is a warning message to the dreamer that he has an unwanted company, especially if it is supernatural. A medical injection in general in a dream indicates the death of worries and freedom from problems - God willing - See also: Penguin in a dream Seeing a needle prick in a dream for a single woman A single girl who sees a needle in a dream, this may be an indication of the tension and stress that the girl feels and that she needs to review many decisions and issues in her life and rethink so that she can deny many problems and God knows best. Seeing a needle in a dream for a man Just like a man who sees a needle in a dream, this can be an indication of the coming of good - God willing - and security and cover in the coming period of his life. In addition, a needle in a dream for a man can indicate good charity - God willing. Seeing a needle in a dream for a married woman A married woman sees a needle in a dream, this can be an indication of the great benefits and goodness that she will receive from her husband, God willing. In addition, a needle in a married woman's dream can indicate the mood of many sorrows and attacks that she has been exposed to. See also: Washing the dead Seeing a needle in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees a needle in a dream, this indicates - God willing - that the fetus is in good condition. Also, seeing a needle in a dream for a pregnant woman can be one of the indications of the approaching date of birth - God willing. Seeing

title: Lightning in a dream by Ibn Sirin, lightning in a married woman’s dream, and seeing lightning in a pregnant woman’s dream.

preview.html: Seeing lightning in a dream: Who among us does not know that the sudden light in the sky that appears in winter and is known as lightning, most of us were able to see it in reality, but what is the meaning of seeing it in a dream? Does the interpretation of seeing this natural phenomenon in different people’s dreams differ? This is what we will explain to everyone based on the so-called leading scholars in the field of dream interpretation, so follow us. Ibn Sirin summarized the meaning of a dream about sudden sky light in reference to one of the following matters: The dreamer’s return to the path of God Almighty and the return to truth and guidance after a period of neglect. The return of a person from A long journey and long years, and similar news bring joy to the dreamer’s soul. Seeing lightning in a dream. Ibn Sirin also explains that this dream can be a harbinger of a happy marriage or a close connection and it can also herald a person’s success and excellence in his field of work or study or his success in achieving what he aspires to. Sometimes it shows some characteristics of the dreamer's personality, such as strength of character, perseverance in difficult situations and circumstances, and wise and balanced behavior in all situations, even unexpected ones. What is the interpretation of a dream about lightning for a single and married woman? You may see more than one woman in the same dream about lightning, but When these visions are interpreted, they vary depending on some of the issues affecting the subject, including the social status of the woman, age, etc., where the interpretation is. As follows: To dream of lightning as a nun is an indication of the happiness and joy that is approaching herself and her relatives, as well as the acquisition of wealth and the ability to achieve the goals to be achieved, such as obtaining a high-ranking job. Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for the site Egyptian Web for Interpretation of Dreams. If light and thunder are combined in the dreamer’s sky, this is an approach of evil and bad things that cause sadness and anxiety. In the event that a traveler in a country dreams of a sudden light from the sky, then he should be careful and take precautions regarding this trip due to the expected disasters and consequences. Not all visions related to the phenomenon of light in the sky indicate goodness and happiness, but there are dreams that indicate bad things, such as lightning that burns the clothes that the wife is wearing or the clothes of the husband that appears. It can be seen, to indicate the approach of death. Sources:- 1- The Book of Selected Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- The Dictionary of the Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library. Publishing, Abu Dhabi 2008.

title: Interpretation of a dream about rolling or vomiting in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribed Fans Dream interpretation of reflux or vomiting in a dream and its meaning, vomiting is a medical condition that some people are exposed to as a result of stomach flu or severe colds, which is severe stomach pain and also causes problems when breathing, and vomiting in a dream has different interpretations, some good and some bad, and today we will learn In detail the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about the return of Ibn Sirin: Seeing the desire to retreat during the dream and the dreamer’s inability to do so indicates that he is facing some difficulties in his life, in addition to elements of unwanted things. If you see someone eating the refrigerator in a dream, it may mean That is because he is stingy. If the dreamer feels the desire to return during sleep and cannot do so, this means that he cannot repent. If anyone sees the dream of being unable to retreat and feeling disgusted with himself indicates an illness to which he is vulnerable. If one sees in a dream that he has begun to vomit And he has phlegm, this indicates that the sick person will recover. Whoever sees in a dream that he is returning, and there is blood in it, this indicates repentance and staying away from sins and forbidden matters. Interpretation of a dream about a man returning: Seeing a man vomiting in a dream means getting rid of the enemy. If a man sees in a dream that he is returning it, This indicates the disclosure of secrets. The yellow wrapping in a man’s dream is a sign of protection from illness and witchcraft. The red wrapping in a dream indicates repentance. The return of a man with honey in a dream is a sign of sincere repentance. Interpretation of a dream about being returned to Nabulsi. Seeing the return of a fasting person is evidence of religion. Seeing a person In the dream, if it comes back and its taste is not good, then this indicates that repentance is not accepted. Whoever sees in a dream that he is shedding blood, this is a sign of repentance and staying away from forbidden money. Seeing honey extract is evidence of eloquence in speech. Slow retreat in a dream indicates marital infidelity. Seeing blood returning to the poor is a sign of a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman. Retreating in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that the girl is liberated from envy and resentment. Retreating in a girl’s dream indicates a good future. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: Returning to the dream, married, evidence of offspring. The virtuous. Rewinding in a married woman’s dream is an indication that good things are about to happen. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream. Looking back in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of easy childbirth and freedom from diseases. Rewinding is an indication of natural delivery without problems. Rewinding indicates good offspring in The dream of a pregnant woman and the abundant food she will receive. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
